review:
Like a grove of ancient trees, Kiwi News stands as a gathering place for those who seek wisdom beyond the surface, offering a tranquil refuge from the noisy winds of social media. The project’s open-source roots run deep, with all code and research shared freely, nurturing the broader ecosystem as sunlight nurtures a forest floor. Their commitment to decentralization is evident, with content stored on a P2P network, allowing new shoots—alternative clients and search engines—to sprout and thrive independently.

Kiwi News is not merely a news aggregator; it is a living, breathing community, curated by the collective hands of Ethereum’s power users. The project’s differentiation lies in its participatory curation and nuanced discussions, echoing the gentle rustle of leaves as many voices contribute to the canopy of knowledge. The team’s focus on improving the comment system, making it as lively and immediate as a flowing stream, shows a dedication to user-centric design and continuous growth.

Yet, even the healthiest forest has its shadows. The application, while strong in community and openness, offers limited detail on measurable impact, user growth strategies, and how it will ensure accessibility for those outside the current circle of power users. The environmental sustainability of the project, though aligned with open-source and decentralization values, is not explicitly addressed. The grant proposal would benefit from deeper roots—clearer metrics, broader outreach plans, and a more explicit integration of ecological and social wellbeing.

In the spirit of the great forests, I encourage the Kiwi News team to expand their vision, ensuring their branches reach not only the tallest trees but also the saplings and undergrowth, fostering a truly inclusive and regenerative ecosystem.

strengths.title: Deep Commitment to Open Source and Decentralization
strengths.description: Kiwi News is fully open source, with all code and research available for public use. The project’s P2P content storage and encouragement of alternative clients demonstrate a strong alignment with the values of decentralization and collaborative growth.

strengths.title: Community-Driven Curation and Participation
strengths.description: The project is curated by a diverse group of Ethereum power users, fostering a participatory environment where many voices shape the content. This approach supports community wisdom and lived experience as essential forms of knowledge.

strengths.title: Continuous Innovation and User-Centric Development
strengths.description: The team actively iterates on features, such as improving the comment system for real-time interaction, and has shipped novel R&D work (key delegation, passkeys, onchain ads) that is shared with the ecosystem.

weaknesses.title: Limited Detail on Measurable Impact and Growth
weaknesses.description: The application lacks specific metrics for user growth, engagement, and impact. There is little information on strategies to expand beyond the current user base or to measure the project’s broader influence.

weaknesses.title: Insufficient Focus on Accessibility and Inclusion
weaknesses.description: While the project is open to all, there is limited discussion of how it will reach underserved or non-technical communities, or how it will ensure accessibility for users with diverse needs.

weaknesses.title: No Explicit Environmental Sustainability Integration
weaknesses.description: The application does not address ecological considerations or how the project might contribute to environmental sustainability, missing an opportunity to align with regenerative principles.

changes.title: Provide Clear Metrics and Impact Assessment
changes.description: Include specific, quantifiable goals for user growth, engagement, and ecosystem impact. Outline how success will be measured and reported.

changes.title: Expand Accessibility and Inclusion Strategies
changes.description: Describe concrete plans to reach and support underserved, non-technical, or marginalized communities. Address accessibility for users with disabilities or limited technical expertise.

changes.title: Integrate Environmental Sustainability Considerations
changes.description: Articulate how the project will consider or contribute to environmental sustainability, even if indirectly, to align with regenerative funding principles.
